title: Summer Comedy Marathon
description: Experience a marathon of side-splitting, unforgettable stand-up comedy!
longDescription:
Summer Comedy Marathon in Ohrid: Your Passport to Laughter!

Get ready for an explosion of laughter in the heart of Ohrid, as the Summer Comedy Marathon takes over the city each year, transforming its beautiful venues into stages for side-splitting stand-up! This vibrant international comedy festival brings together talented comedians from Macedonia and across the globe, promising an unforgettable summer experience filled with humor, wit, and unexpected moments. Typically running from late July to mid-August, the festival showcases a diverse program of shows, from classic stand-up and improv performances to unique comedy jams and even English-language acts. Audiences can enjoy the performances at iconic Ohrid locations like JAZZ INN, Cuba Libre, the Center for Culture "Grigor Prlichev," and Dolni Saraj, each providing a distinct atmosphere for a night of pure comedic delight. The marathon prides itself on presenting fresh, original material, making every show a unique encounter with the art of laughter.

Organized by HAHAHA: More Than Just a Production House

The Summer Comedy Marathon is proudly brought to you by HAHAHA, a dynamic production house based right here in Ohrid. HAHAHA is dedicated to fostering the comedy scene and delivering high-quality entertainment. They are the driving force behind the festival, handling everything from artist coordination to ticket sales, ensuring a seamless and hilarious experience for all attendees. Their passion for comedy shines through in the diverse and engaging program they curate annually.

For more information and tickets, you can visit their website: • HAHAHA.mk

events.name: 2 Mothers Brothers & 2 Cousins
events.shortDescription: Wine, stars (the ones in the sky, we're not bragging!), and comedy – don't miss the grand opening of the Summer Comedy Marathon!

events.shortDescription: This isn't for the faint of heart – it's only for those who love to laugh in the face of darkness!

events.shortDescription: If you're looking for pure, concentrated laughter, this is the night for you!

events.shortDescription: He's going to tell you everything he thinks about us... right there on stage!

events.shortDescription: FIKSNO is more than just a performance – it's a way of life, uniquely Bratuched's!

events.shortDescription: Join us for a magical evening in the enchanting atmosphere of Mountain House Spiridon – Galicica

events.shortDescription: Get ready for improvisation, spontaneous jokes, and full interaction

events.shortDescription: Do people tell you that you're hilarious? This is your moment!

events.shortDescription: Get ready for a hellishly hilarious comedy cabaret packed with jokes and parodies of famous songs!

events.name: Crn Humor
events.shortDescription: Prepare for an evening of the boldest jokes and darkest humor that will make you cry with laughter!

events.name: Comedy Jam
events.shortDescription: Cooking up the most unexpected show yet – with you, the audience, as the secret ingredient!

events.shortDescription: Second, and even more shamelessly hilarious, edition of the hottest comedy night in the marathon!

events.shortDescription: Get ready for the strongest jokes, the most hilarious moments, and the finest from our comedians.

events.shortDescription: Expect jokes at our expense and a tip for the bartender.

events.name: Nitro 2 Live

events.name: Finale
events.shortDescription: The stage at Dolni Saraj under the starry sky is set for a magnificent conclusion!

title: Ohrid Water Festival
description: Experience sports, nature, and pure fun!
longDescription:
Dive into the Ohrid Water Festival: Where Sports Meet Nature!

The Ohrid Water Festival isn't just an event it's a project that beautifully blends the thrill of water sports with Ohrid's incredible natural beauty, all while nurturing the growth of our local community.

Our dream and our drive? To unite all of Ohrid's vibrant water sports and their activities under one exciting, sports-tourism BRAND: the Ohrid Water Festival.

Ohrid and North Macedonia truly deserve a modern, strategic project that celebrates our iconic Lake Ohrid. The Ohrid Water Festival, with its dynamic concept, is exactly what Ohrid needs to offer the wider domestic and international sports and tourism communities.

We see immense potential for this festival! With the support of our partners, we're confident we can elevate both Ohrid and the festival to the ranks of the world's most sought-after destinations and sports-tourism activities for everyone who loves water, water sports, and a great time.

Our Focus: Lake, Sports, and Community

Our strategic focus is crystal clear: the lake, its protection, water sports, the clubs and associations connected to the water, and especially the dedicated sports professionals who pour their hearts into the lake every day. These are all reasons why we're committing ourselves fully to creating a new sporting tradition. This tradition will undoubtedly elevate Ohrid's active tourism and the city itself to the European pedestal of sports-tourism cities.

The Ohrid Water Festival introduces a fresh and unique concept for a sports festival centered around water and water-based activities. It's designed to offer a fantastic array of activities for all ages and all water enthusiasts. These activities will be thoughtfully divided into three categories: sports, socio-educational, and promotional.

What to Expect: Nine Days of Non-Stop Fun!

Get ready for nine days of non-stop excitement, from August 19th to August 27th. Each day will offer a dynamic mix of activities spread throughout. We've planned over 30 activities across these ten days! The highlight will be the traditional Ohrid Swimming Marathon, stretching from St. Naum to Ohrid, scheduled for August 26th.

Beyond the thrilling sports and recreational activities, the festival will feature plenty of social gatherings, music, educational sessions, and promotions. There will also be panel discussions, exhibitions, and presentations on healthy eating.

Olympic and Eco-Friendly!

It's important to us to highlight that all sports featured in the festival are Olympic sports, and, crucially, they are eco-friendly. This commitment gives us even more motivation and a sense of purpose to make this festival a resounding success.
